name: Slime
description:
the origin of this creature is unknown, it was first identified many years before the arrival of the Litch.
"the Tome of monsters and beasts" describes the Slime as a creature without a will of its own that advances undaunted swallowing and dissolving everything it touches. The number of specimens of this creature is unknown as it is impossible to distinguish one slime from another as they lack connotations, these monsters are also devoid of organs and practically intangible as they are made of a viscous acid that seems to flow sensa stop from the top of the head. The slime(s?) usually have obsidian stones that it use as "eyes", this phenomenon has not yet found an explanation
